pages.text: $(li)Kego made the icons and an Antimated Background for the $(l)Minecraft Main Menu$().$(br)$(li)Kego made all the art of the Weapons and Items added in the $(l)Enders Journey Weapons ResourcePack$().

$(li)Kego made the all the art of the Boss Bars in the $(l)Enders Journey Boss Bars Resourcepack$().$(br)$(li)Kego made the art of the buttons in the $(l)Enders Journey Resourcepack$().$(br)$(li)Kego made the art for $(l)Modern World Creation Resourcepack$().$(br)$(li)Kego made the Banners for the Modpack Curseforge website.
